comment.author: 42264328@N00
comment._content: Wikipedia article on Ethel Roosevelt Derby gives the date of the wedding as 4 April 1913.

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content: Thanks for the information on the date of the wedding. Will submit it for review and possible update to the catalog record.

comment.author: 42264328@N00
comment._content: Here's the New York Times article, 5 April 1913--Headline: ETHEL ROOSEVELT WED TO DR. DERBY; 1,000 Persons with Band Cheer Bride as She Appears at Oyster Bay Church. COLONEL'S HOME PACKED Roosevelt Baby Grand daughter Enlivens the Marriage Service -- Derbys Sail for Europe To-day Reading inside the article, it verifies the wedding date as 4 April 1913, and gives the location as Christ Episcopal Church, Oyster Bay, Long Island. The groom was Dr. Richard Derby.
